title: Bitcoin Beginner- A Step By Step Guide [Epub & Mobi] [StormR
description:
Bitcoin Beginner: A Step By Step Guide To Buying, Selling And Investing In Bitcoins
Author: Sam Patterson
Published: 2013
Publisher: Better Life Publishers
ASIN: B00DKLZLB4
Format: Retail Epub and Mobi
Reader Required:
Epub- Adobe Digital Editions, Calibre, MoonReader for Android
Mobi- Kindle app, Calibre, MoonReader for Android

Bitcoin: currency of the future?
Did you know that the Bitcoin currency gained 1,000% in value earlier this year? What is it that makes this virtual currency so special? Should you join this increasingly popular payment system? This ebook for Bitcoin Beginners like you takes you by the hand, answering questions like:

The history behind the Bitcoin revolution
How the Bitcoin system works - no overly technical language here!
Surprising ways to get free Bitcoin exposed 
How to earn in Bitcoin
Which online and offline markets to buy Bitcoins at
The safest online wallet providers
How you can maximize security
How to get safely paid in Bitcoins
Where you can pay with your Bitcoins 
What the future holds for Bitcoin - a must read!
How to stay on top of the latest Bitcoin developments
Don't worry about intimidating terms like blockchain, wallet, private key, or mining. You will learn about them step by step in the only Bitcoin guide you will ever need.

All you need to know about Bitcoin
For "dummies" like Sam Patterson himself once was, a subject needs to be broken down into bite-sized chunks. After years of experimenting extensively with Bitcoin, Patterson brings you a no-fluff, step-by-step Bitcoin guide that will get you started in the new economy.
